name: Bob The Blob (Cross Gen Games)
description:
Enjoy a casual platform RPG in which the enemies get stronger overtime and you can too if you you kill enough of the Bob Blobs to raise your level.  Find the princess and win the game.  

CONTROLS:

A or Left Arrow = go left

D or Right arrow = go right

W or Up arrow = jump

Shift = walk slower

Control = run fast

Space-Bar = attack/slash

Escape = End the game

Enter = restart the game

This is my second game of my game a week challenge so everything in this game was made/put together in one week.  I am a new game developer looking to learn the most I can from putting out these games every week.  Check out the devlog for a more in depth breakdown of my design decisions and learning process.  

Enjoy!!
